Name: Spiked Shield
Effect: Gain +5 PARTS defense. Starts with 2 Charges. When you use this, remove 1 Charge. When it has 0, discard it.

Name: Barbed Trap
Effect: Gain +5 WIRING defense. Starts with 2 Charges. When you use this, remove 1 Charge. When it has 0, discard it.

Name: Layered Brace
Effect: Gain +5 PLATES defense. Starts with 2 Charges. When you use this, remove 1 Charge. When it has 0, discard it.

Name: Recycler-Net
Effect: Gain +9 WIRING defense. If this card is used to Kill a Threat, return it to your hand at the end of the round. (One-use if no kill).

Name: Boar Spear
Effect: Gain +9 PARTS defense. If this card is used to Kill a Threat, return it to your hand at the end of the round. (One-use if no kill).

Name: Adrenaline
Effect: If you FAIL, ignore all consequences (gaining Injury, "On Fail:" effects, etc.) this round.

Name: Lure to Weakness
Effect: Gain +5 of each defense. Choose one of your Threat's non-highest stats. For this turn, that stat is the target for the Kill calculation.

Name: Corrosive Sludge
Effect: Gain +5 of each defense. Choose one stat on your Threat. That stat loses Resistant and Immune for this defense.

Name: Makeshift Amp
Effect: Pay X additional Scrap of any one type. Gain +X defense for that type. This defense value is not affected by Resistance or Immunity.
